misuse: CWE-757: Selection of Less-Secure Algorithm During Negotiation
description: The code is using AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding as the cipher algorithm, which is a less secure algorithm than the recommended AES/GCM/NoPadding. Using a less secure algorithm can leave the data vulnerable to attacks.
recommendation: Replace the AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding algorithm with AES/GCM/NoPadding for better security.
